text: 16|86|Ara yara sirka kareche, tara yakhana tadera sarikaderake dekhabe takhana balabe, ‘he amadera raba! Era'i tara yaderake amara apanara sarika karechilama, yaderake amara apanara paribarte dakatama;’ takhana sarikara e katha musarikadera dike phiriye diye balabe, ‘niscaya tomara mithyabadi.’
